website_summaries.verdict: A reliable, fun-filled bounce house that sits at a slightly lower price point than its competitors.
pros: Made from quality, durable material, but comes with repair patches just in case
Setup is extremely quick and easy
The castle rolls neatly into a small bag, similar to a sleeping bag
The castle also comes with stakes to keep it securely in place while the kids are jumping
The fan was surprisingly quiet, an appreciated bonus for the parents
cons: Velcro strips on the entrance are quite thin and don't easily stay together

customer_reviews.title: SEVEN years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: SEVEN years and still going strong, despite taking a beating. We've had to patch a hole here and there, but this thing has seen us through many snowstorms and play dates, both indoors and outdoors. Pretty much the best money we ever spent on any kids' toy.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: I was the best Dad, if only for that moment...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas morning I took a video of my 2 year old son climbing down the stairs and finding this bounce castle inflated inside of our family room. He loves this! We play in it for close to an hour almost everyday. It is great fun and great exercise for my little one. Seeing him so happy is priceless and this came with a free warrantee so he can enjoy it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best VALUE bounce castle available!
customer_reviews.text: Our toddlers love this bounce castle! It has already provided hours of entertainment and worn out kids. Many of our friends have the Little Tikes bouncy but this thing absolutely blows them away - in both size and quality!!! The adults (grandparents included!) have had no problem getting in as well (no bouncing of course, just laying across the seems) and it will even inflate and lift me in it (210 lbs) + both toddlers. The quality of this bouncy has definitely left us satisfied with our purchase! I also picked up and recommend a 94 L nylon duffle bag (on amazon) to store it (w/o blower) - see photo.
customer_reviews.author: JOE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This bounce house has been so much fun for my kids! They go crazy in this thing. We are careful not to take toys inside and not to jump with shoes and it has been very durable. I thought it might be one of those things that the kids played with for a couple of weeks and lost interest but not the case. It has been heavily used for the last couple of years. My 10 year old still likes to jump around in it but interest does seem to be waning a little at that age.
customer_reviews.author: Jenerator

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little kids
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it’s a jumper. It says only for 3 100lbs kids. I weigh 170 and I went in there with my 30 lb kid and it heald up fine. I have it inside the house with 9’ ceiling. I’m 4 year old has a blast in there flipping. The only thing is that it’s not like the regular jumper not as bouncy. It’s made of different material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it, ages 3 and 4...and, one 105 lb. grown up ;)
customer_reviews.text: You won't be sorry. We combined it with a splash pad for hours of fun. The bounce house was easy to set up and truly inflated in no time at all. It was fun just watching it take shape, but look quickly or you'll miss it. It seems very durable. We haven't folded it back up yet, but plan to put it in a large Tupperware type tub for storage between uses. (2 weeks later) Okay, so we finally folded it up and packed it into a large rubbermaid container. It was so much easier than I thought, and should be just as simple to pull out and use again.
customer_reviews.author: A Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for elementary kids and younger.
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it look like it's okay only for small kids, under 4 years of age, so I was nervous about buying, but am completely satisfied. I have girls, weighing 55 and 65 pounds. There is plenty of room for them and probably 2 more similar sized kids at the same time. I like that it's enclosed on all sides, so nobody is going to fall out by accident. It was assembled quickly (less than 10 minutes ). I haven't packed it up yet, so I can't rate that part yet.
customer_reviews.author: MARLIES M SHEPPARD

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this as I thought it would be fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as I thought it would be fun for the kids. The product arrived on time and was too simple to put together (unpack and basically plug in the fan). Everyone was amazed how quickly it inflated and how excited the kids were. It appears to be fairly durable and was easy to pack and put away. Update - It has been a while since originally ordering this. Just finished a party with about 20 kids. The bounce house was a huge success and at times there were several big kids 10-12 year olds playing in the bouncer without any issues. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Loved this one
customer_reviews.text: I got it out of the box and put up in about 10 min. My 2 year old loved it and went right in and was jumping around and using the ramp as a slide. Seems to be made of quality materials and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and poor quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material used to make this bouncer is very thin and poor. The bottom of this bouncer started to wear and almost cut open after the 1st use. The nylon is very thin and won't last long. I have laid down a blanket underneath this bouncer to avoid it from being torn quickly. I am disappointed from this purchase. I don't recommend this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: fsarb1

customer_reviews.title: kids loved it !
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this product ! We blew it up for a Halloween party and at one point I think that there were about 8 little kids jumping . It can reasonable fit 3 little ones. My 8 year old and his friends jumped around with no issues but this is probably better suited for like 5 year old's and younger . My son wasn't getting as much "air time" that he wanted but still has a good time in there. Overall, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's 2nd birthday party and she's now almost 3 and we still use it! I have carried it with me to visit relatives to keep the little one occupied also. It folds up easy and goes up in a flash! Not super loud, doesn't take up a lot of space. Only thing I would warn is that if you have it out in direct sun it will get VERY hot. We used it over the summer in Florida and set in part shade. The part in direct sunlight made the kids cry it was so hot. We just scooted it over to shade the whole thing and sometimes misted some water on it which the kids loved.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: I got in with him at one point but was to scared to jump on it(I’m 5’4 130lb) I’m sure it would’ve been fine but still didn’t want to risk ruining a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4yr old and he loves it! I got in with him at one point but was to scared to jump on it(I’m 5’4 130lb) I’m sure it would’ve been fine but still didn’t want to risk ruining a new bounce house. Super glad we don’t have to rent one now just to enjoy for a couple of hours! Only problem we had was with shipping we were suppose to receive it when hurricane Irma came through so nothing we could’ve done there and it was mostly FedEx who dropped the ball but over all good buy
customer_reviews.author: K&M

customer_reviews.title: it's useless.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in 2015. The blower stopped working 1 year later. 2016. The bounce house still works. Without the blower, it's useless. ***Update*** I love the customer service. They replaced the blower. I haven't had a problem since. I use it all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Durable, Provides endless fun
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bounce house in March of 2018, 2.5 years later it is still in great condition. It was used outside for the first year but always on a tarp and put away when we were done. It now lives in our basement and the kids turn it on whenever they want. It’s best for ages 2-6, but older kids up to 10 have enjoyed it. It’s provided so much fun and burns lots of energy. Sometimes we add balls and we’ve put our nugget comfort cushion on the slide to make it bigger and the kids somersault or jump off of it. Completely worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: This is great entertainment for our grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: This is great entertainment for our grandchildren. However, there is one big flaw. The Velcro strips on the door/entry aren't big or strong enough to keep the entry closed. It is very easy for the kids inside to fall out of the bouncer. We need to station an adult there at all times to prevent them from falling and hurting themselves. We are exploring options like adding snaps to keep it closed.
customer_reviews.author: RS II

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughters birthday party we were having at the house with 10 kids. It was a super hot day so we used it in the he garage. Since then we’ve used it two more tomes outside. Overall we are happy with it. The one thing we would improve upon is the way it connects to the blower. It’s not easy to tie it on so it doesn’t come off and if it does come off while kids are bouncing they could get stuck inside. A Velcro closure of some sort would make this easier to connect and stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: IRGCT

customer_reviews.title: Homerun for our 3.5, 2.5 and 1.5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift that is used inside during winter and outside during all other times. Gets used almost every day for 2-4 hours. Great way to burn up all that energy. Young kids love learning how to run although running the bounce castle is fun too!
customer_reviews.author: kathy boone

customer_reviews.title: something written on each corner
customer_reviews.text: After I unpacked the package and inflated it, I noticed something written on each corner. I wasn't sure if this was part of its QC process however amazon verified there should not have anything written on it. The built quality seems sturdy. will return this and get another one probably.
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon purchase for my kids ever.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, parents love how much kids love it and how tired they get playing on it! We're on our second summer of heavy use and no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: PDXLach

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 years ago for my son's 3rd birthday party. Since then, we have brought it out time and time again. It has withstood being turned upside-down, having the hose dragged into it and being soaked with water, and many many rambunctious boys playing...(read: experimenting with trying to destroy the dang thing short of actually intentionally puncturing it). I'm seriously so surprised it has held up to these kids. I would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Cycler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bounce house for an indoor party
customer_reviews.text: This bounce house is amazing! I bought it for my son’s 5th birthday and it exceeded my expectations. It was so easy to blow up and a perfect size for an indoor party. I had a friend who was watching the kids and trying to limit the number at every given time, but they were 3-5 kids in there. It was definitely a hit and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stella-O!

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun for small kiddos; sanity saver for parents
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a sanity saver for any family with small children! I can't speak to the longevity yet but we bought this model based on a friend's recommendation (once it was on sale). Theirs is still going strong after a year of frequent usage. It's about as loud as a hair dryer so that's a plus from the "don't annoy the neighbor's perspective" and they even included patch material and replacement thread. Overall, this momma is impressed!
customer_reviews.author: East of terrible, west of workable

customer_reviews.title: would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a month or so ago for our almost 3 year old and have also had a "big" kid jumping around in it. The bounce house is well made, easy to inflate and deflate and I really like that it has netting on all 4 sides with a securable velcro closure (realized this was VERY important after watching the kids launch themselves around inside). The motor/blower is easy to setup and operate and really isn't all that loud either. I am happy with the purchase and would buy this brand again and recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER !
customer_reviews.text: Bought for birthday party. Cheaper than to rent and we will have it. It is awesome! Very easy to set up and inflate. I think it says can hold 3-4 kids but can do more if they are little (we had 7 kids but they were 5 year olds). Perfect to keep in the house as now after the party, our child still jumps in it on cold, rainy days. Highly recommend!! Seems to be good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kang

customer_reviews.title: Great Bounce House!!
customer_reviews.text: Inflates in under 30 seconds and is much bigger than in the picture (that’s a good thing)! It says max 3 kids at 100 lbs a piece but this could easily hold 5 toddlers with room to spare. The “bounce” portion of the inside feels commercial grade while the outside is a heavy duty vinyl. Would highly recommend for indoor or outdoor use!
customer_reviews.author: Techtennis

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for toddlers in quarantine
customer_reviews.text: This product has not outlived Covid. It sprung a huge hole 2 months after buying and it's too big for the patch kit. Huge disappointment for my family and a big waste of money in the end. We are really upset. We had it indoors in a large space. The hole was just from normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really a great product. My 4 year old monster (hyper boy) uses this thing almost every week if not more. He and his two girlfriends always jump in it and go crazy. I am 220lbs and even get in it with them from time to time. I don't jump up and down but I will get on my knees and wrestle with them. I am really impressed. Lightweight too so when I want to pick it up and put it in the truck to bring somewhere, it's really simple. We have turned the blower on and off hundreds of times and it never fells. Long power cord too. Can't say enough good about this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I like this bouncy castle because all 4 sides have mesh and the mesh door is shut with velcro - less chance of kids bouncing out. The fabric is very thick and sturdy. My kids have bounced in it nearly every day since we bought it. It is easy to take down, roll up and tie up with the included straps. The fan is not as loud as I was expecting which was a pleasant surprise. All in all, I'm pleased. It's a good way for the kids to blow off some steam on days we can't go to the park.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Living in an area where summer temps hover at 105° I thought I would inflate this in my formal living room. Too bad we don't have a video of that as it was rather funny. The bounce house says it can fit 3 children and it can fit 3 adults. It is very durable and easy to inflate. I was hoping for a more secure closing on the doorway but it is easy to use. I think it is a great value for the money and plan on using it at birthday parties and tailgates. The 2 year warranty is good to know but hopefully we will not have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: TOzz

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, my children and neighbor kids flock to it constantly. This product is superior in quality and fan noise. I had purchased a Little tyke product a year ago, i thought it was a great product until I tried the Blast Zone product. The blast zone product can handle more weight, more durable bounce material( vinyl like) instead parachute cloth like and the best is a super quiet fan. I love being able to converse with parents while watching the children play and laugh. Storage is easy as well. I also enjoy it will continue to serve my children longer than Little tykes product. It is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: john Carson

customer_reviews.title: Best company & jump house!
customer_reviews.text: Clearly the 5-star rating isn't an accident! Like others have said, their customer service alone is 5-stars. They replaced a pump from this jump house that we bought in 2015. They really stand by their product. Our kids have enjoyed endless hours of fun (7yo, 5yo, 2yo). And their friends love it too. We keep it inside full-time. We bought it for $300 - now it's on sale for $199. Seriously you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: skimom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for for my 3 year old little boy. He LOVES it. IT is winter here, so we set it up in our garage. It is really really easy to assemble and so far we have had my wife jumping with him and no problems (she is 120 lbs and he is 40 lbs). I am 220 and I have crawled around in there but no jumping for this overweight guy. Anyways, much more affordable that the industrial bounce houses and more options for set up. You could probably set this up in your living room.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Wald

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: We ended up buying this for our kids birthday party and it was a hit. The bouncy material looks very durable and super easy to set up, basically just need to roll it up when you're done. The blower is small and light, dead simple to use. To put it in perspective, you can rent a comparable bouncer for almost as much as the cost of this. Then, factor in the number of times you will use it (pretty much every time kids are over at your house), it really does pay for itself. If you wanted to, you can rent it out to other families and make your money back.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: First off, I very, very rarely review or comment so when I do it carries weight. We're four days into indoor playland for a 5-year old and 2.5 year old. What a respite from self-imposed lockdown. I'm a person who likes for things to LAST and when merited I'll spend a little more. This definitely fits the bill. It's constructed well. It inflates instantly. It deflates as advertised. I don't anticipate any problems. The smiles are priceless! Highly endorsed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was the best purchase I made for my grand children
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I made for my grand children. The price was great and they love their Castle. Bare in mind there is 6 kids all 7 and under, 3 of the older jump then 3 younger. Sometimes an older will get in with a younger child, but, they have learned to play together and laugh together. Momma gets a little break to. Definitely highly recommend.5+ stars super transaction and quick shipping. Easy set up, even the 7yr old does it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, surprisingly solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised they can sell an item this good for this price. We have it setup on concrete and our kids ages 1 to 15 have used it a lot for months and it is still in good condition. We as parents even sometimes join them even though I don’t think it is meant for that much weight. It holds just fine. The fan it comes with is high quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: feels and looks like good quality and blows up quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, feels and looks like good quality and blows up quickly, but its not very bouncy!! So strange, bc my three year old son only weighs about 30 pounds and even he can't even get much "jump" out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was so worth the money. We have used every day for almost a week. Super easy to blow up. The girls love it and I love that it takes less than a minute to get ready. Hopefully it holds up over time. We have it in our basement with foam puzzle mats underneath. It does slide a little but super easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Jacee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality - worth price!
customer_reviews.text: So glad we didn’t go cheaper on this item. Love it! Amazing quality, stable , durable and fun. Perfect for toddler through 6. Got it for party and was hit! Renting one would have been more than purchase price! Now we have for family time and play dates ! We put in right under our canopy for shade on hot days. Great height and not too overwhelming in size .
customer_reviews.author: Andrés &  Mari

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two year olds birthday party & we used it once outside otherwise all inside use. I keep it folded in the living room behind the couch and bring it out whenever we have play dates. Neighbor kids love it. Daughter is 3 now and it’s been great for a year. Blows up in 30 seconds and deflates fully in a few minutes. Best purchase, such a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blower issues
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in 2016 and yesterday the blower started making a loud noise and the bounce house immediately went flat with our 3 and 5 year old inside. I attempted to contact the company with no luck. The web form isn’t working properly and phone just rings with no voicemail. I hope the company will do what’s right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Moon Bounce!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this moon bounce...I had my girlfriends two grandsons who are 3 and 4 try it out and they loved it...the only thing that I can say anything is to be careful the slide is really close to the door so to get in and out can be tricky for the kids because the slide is slippery...the boys got use to it!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Snows

customer_reviews.title: Bought for our granddaughter at 22 months
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, nice material, not cheap, not too big to do by yourself, blows up very quickly with included pump. I really liked that the door going in by the slide is Velcro closed to avoid little ones from falling out the door while jumping. I think this is the perfect size for fun without having a giant commercial jumper and yet not so small they outgrow it in one or two years. Great little castle to grow with.
customer_reviews.author: Stephs stuff

customer_reviews.title: Very happy kids
customer_reviews.text: This is buy far the coolest thing I have ever bought on amazon. It’s big and looks just like the jumpers you rent for parties but maybe half the size. Material is strong and good quality. The colors are vibrant and makes all the kids excited to see it pop up. Only two kids (4 & 3) and one adult have jumped in there during the same time and the jumper handled the weight well. The only con is that it takes about 10 min to fold it super tight into a burrito shape and throw in a large storage box to put away after each use. If this jumper ever breaks or tears I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bouncer for about 2.5 months now and really impressed. The first time you put it up it may take 8-10 mins, but we're able to get the bouncy house rolled out and inflated in literally 3 minutes now. Super easy to put up and take down and the kids love it. The material seems durable and I don't see any quality concerns. Don't let the low price scare you away! This is a great little setup for kids up to 7 or 8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: SKA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bounce house
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic purchase. I bought it for my 4yo, however my 7 yo and her friends love it too. I have had several little ones and 2-3 bigger kids in this little buddy and never had an issue. I inflate it in my garage to keep it clean and avoid risk of it taking flight outside. Conceivably it could be inflated in a room with a tall ceiling. The reviews are what led me to purchase this bounce house, and they were on the money!!! Easy to inflate/deflate and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 3 yrs daughter. She loves it, we have been using it in out basement. Inflate and deflate easily. Motor sound not too bad but i am limiting 30 min per session to be safe bc it still indoor. So far no complaints but i will update later in term Of durability and ease of folding
customer_reviews.author: Just a reg customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this was bought for my 3 year old bday party.. and kinda as described it only does 300 pound max .. seriously at 300 it's about to collapse soo I would say no more than 4..50 pound kids max because when they get to jumping it blows the air out back and seems like it's going to pop it!! Anywasy not bad for looks and a few small kids having fun..but dont go for a real deal large party!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. Better then renting.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for Kids parties. Anyone can jump in there, my cousin went jumping with the kids for a good 5 minutes and hes 6 foot tall 190lb. All the parts (blower, castle material) is of very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: ispeedca

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is great. This has been put to great use. We havent folded it or put it away since we got it a few months ago. We use it indoors. Added August 2020. I added another star, so 5 stars. This has been used over and over and over again during the stay at home orders. We are so thankful to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Clement

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old and 19 month twins . . . They LOVE it! We have only had it a few months, but seem durable. Inflates and deflates quickly. Its Its everything I wanted it to be, big enough for 3 kids, small enough for indoor use (as well as outdoor use), keeps my kids occupied for hours. If you are considering buying this bounce house . . . BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It will pay for itself.
customer_reviews.text: When we were faced with getting a bouncy house for a birthday party we saw that the price for renting a bounce house and buying a bounce house was the same. I am so impressed with this product. It is much quieter than I thought it would be. Our three-year-old is super excited. Now it can be a fun thing to burn energy on random nights or during fun events.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this bounce house for 2 weeks now and we love it!! My son will be 2 in July and he thinks it’s the coolest thing. He spends over 2 hours in it each day. We also bought balls to go with it. It’s nice because the balls stay in the bounce house because of the Velcro door/opening is tight and secure. Also don’t have to worry about my son accidentally falling out. Putting up/taking down is not bad. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money! This was purchased for my sons first birthday. We’ve used it 19 times since then outdoors and it’s amazing! The kids love it, it really is a babysitter! The slide is perfect for the very little kids to be entertained, and the interior is big and durable. So easy to inflate in a minute, and can be used over and over again. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.  Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome! This thing is one of the best purchases I've ever made, and I am not a usual product review writer. Very durable, inflates in less then a minute, and is perfect for rainy day energy burning. We keep it indoors and use it near daily. Not too loud (it isn't silent by any means, but very tolerable decibel level). Our 3 and 5 year olds stay in until we drag them out. I highly recommend this jump house if you have the room indoors. Cannot speak to it's outdoor durability. I don't want the whole neighborhood in my yard!
customer_reviews.author: VladtheRipper

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to set up. Kids had a blast. Depending on kid size had three to four kids in it. Got it for my charity kids Christmas party so about a hundred different kids were in and out of it for two and a half hours. Very pleased so far. FYI unless your a magician it will not fit back in the box. Get a nice plastic tote to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Inflates quick. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this thing for the boys birthday. Test run in the garage seemed to work fine. The floor is decently tough. Not sure if it will last forever, but it should hold up for a bit. Inflated pretty quick. Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Dallymon

customer_reviews.title: Kids on vacation had a BLAST
customer_reviews.text: Easily transportable and quick inflation. Two 4 year olds had a blast in it during recent week long vacation. Folds up to sleeping bag size and is easy to unpack and inflate. I bought the 200 pack of balls like at Sesame park and this added to their enjoyment. They used it every day and were in and out of it constantly. It is well made and easy to set up and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: J Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Exercise
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas present for my grandkids they love it the jump all day. Like this one kids for kids enclosure easy to set up inflates in seconds you must keep running and than turn off when finished great gift for kids
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup and extremely durable!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I decided to buy this jumper for my daughter's 5th birthday party! We had about 6 kids, ages 2-6 on it at one time and it held up amazingly. Great price, esp if you consider the price for renting a bounce house over and over again for a younger child's bday. I did not even have to stake it down outside for my 3 girls to jump! It didn't move at all! Takes all of 5 minutes to set up, including toting it to the yard. I'm pregnant and it is still super easy to do. So excited to use all summer long and for my two other daughter's birthdays later this year. Great great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say it has been one of the best purchases I have made
customer_reviews.text: Having gone to many children parties as of late, I constantly see these "Jumpy Tents" every time. After inquiring as to what it costs to rent one of these inflatable castles, the average price ranges from $125-$400 a day! So when I saw that I can own one of these for a reasonable one time cost, I couldn't pass up the opportunity! Needless to say it has been one of the best purchases I have made. Set up is simple, quality is outstanding and did I mention that it keeps the kids from tearing up the inside and outside of your home.... well.... at least for the time that they are burning energy, bouncing away!
customer_reviews.author: Robert. L

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: My parents bought this as a Christmas gift for my 3 year old and he LOVES it. We have inflated it in our garage for a winter activity and it's worked perfectly for him to jump off some energy. VERY easy to inflate and deflate. Easy to set up and take down. Great quality. Good price. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Here it is, the bounce house you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: It's this simple. If you're looking at bounce houses, this is the one. i looked for weeks and settled on this one. I am not disappoint. It's very easy to setup (less than 10 minutes with only 1 person) and inflected in less than 1 minute. It goes down in less than 10 minutes with 2 people. It survived and thrived our 2 young kids as well as 2 birthday parties without any signs of wear or tear. Definitely the main attraction every time. Be prepared to make friends with your neighbors kids because as soon as it goes up, everyone comes running. Can't say enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Hucaluk

customer_reviews.title: Nice bounce house for the littles! 👍
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this for their birthday last June. We used it for the birthday party that day and quite a few times since then. They absolutely love it! We just keep it in a big container so it’s easy to take out/ put away. Super durable and way better than paying $300 to just rent a bounce house for the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! Our daughter loves it, and it inflates and deflates very quickly! I strongly recommended this bounce house. The weight recommendation as accurate and I would probably not use with more than 3 children. We have set it up both indoor and outdoor as the transport is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Bounce house!! Built well and great size.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bounce house. My kids (3.5 yr old twins) love it. It is sturdy and well built. We are currently using it in the basement during the winter. It’s big enough for more than one kid to jump at a time. I’m 170lbs and had no trouble getting in with them to play with them. Highly recommended!! I did some research on this in the 200-350 range and this one seemed to be the best out of all of them if you have the room for it compared to the smaller little tykes ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Why Rent when you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Bounce House for my five Grand kids, ages 1 1/2 - 11. They All Love it!!! I am very Happy with this purchase. It is good, strong quality. This is very easy to put up. I received my order within just a few days, with no problems at all. I only had to pay $25 more to buy this, instead of renting one for four hours. I am very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: djp

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product. My two year old has enjoyed it. I have a small seam leak after low hours of use and there has only been one 30 pound 2 year old in it which is why I give it a 4 star instead of 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought about renting an inflatable bouncer, but decided it would be cheaper (in the long run) to buy one. This bouncer is not as large as the rentals, but still a lot of fun for the kids. I've used it about 7-8 times (birthday parties and family get-togethers) over the years and it's held up very well. It's easy to setup and the material is durable. I definitely recommend this product! Update: It’s been 5 years and we haven’t had a single issue with the bounce house.
customer_reviews.author: M.McFly

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Made for a great Christmas present for the kids. We are very happy with the quality and the kids have a blast in the bounce house! It is not really meant for adults to jump in, however i do climb in with my kids while they jump around. It holds up really well with myself and my two kids inside.
customer_reviews.author: John Volgi

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and man its sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sturdy and easy to use. Lots of fun on toddler birthday and many kids inside, a bit more than recommended but no issues and lots of fun. Great product for the price and fun! One of the guest was so impressed to they bought one too!
customer_reviews.author: bembret

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to last many years for our son
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this bounce house. I bought this for my sons 2nd birthday party and it was a huge hit. We were looking at blast zone smaller one but decided on this one as it would give us a few extra years of use since it was larger. It will pay for its self after a couple times using it compared to paying for a rental each time. It blows up quickly and has nice bag to place it back in when done. This is not a cheap bounce house, materials seem strong and thick. I highly recommend this bounce house and will get tons of use.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMan34

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased the Blast Zone Magic Castle Inflatable Bouncer for our 2-yr old twins. So far, it’s been great. While my wife and I don’t “jump” in it, we all fit, AND I horse-plays with the children in it. The children has been asking for it every day! Great purchase – wish we would have gotten it 2 month earlier for their 2nd birthday instead of spending $175 for a rental for 4 hours! It’s extremely easy to set up and clean up, about 5-7 mins each. We generally set it up for about 30-45 mins for the kids to play, and then clean up. Totally worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Etoast

customer_reviews.title: So Worth the Money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable is worth every penny. I purchased this for my 6 and 4 year old grandsons. They love it. It is so sturdy and goes up in about 10 minutes. Delivery was on time, and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: "B"

customer_reviews.title: Works great, our kids beg for it daily!
customer_reviews.text: We got to use this twice! The kids absolutely loved it, it held up great! Someone got into it that was way too big and luckily the hose came off of the blower instead of it blowing out which was great, so i suggest not making the hose to the blower super tight so that is the weak point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I have ever spent! Purchased for my 3 year old for her birthday. It’s already paid for itself with how much we have used it. Set up is incredibly easy and clean up is too! Bounce house seems very durable, my dog has jumped in there with no issues. We even had a few bigger kids (10 year olds) jumping and doing flips with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Kids are loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied so far with this! Our last bounce house died after a year (bought from a different company) and so we bought this one because of the positive reviews. I was pleasantly surprised when we were offered a free two year warranty. My only complaint is that the slide part is so small as not be a real slide...but this doesn't change my 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gwyn Anderson III

customer_reviews.title: Great fun at a birthday party
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who is 6. We set it up at her party and all of the kids had a blast. We had anywhere from 6 years old to 14 year old in it and it held up very well. I would highly recommend this bounce house, it was a great purchase. This is not too big to fit inside of the house in an empty room during the hot summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My cousin bought one that looks just like this. I saw hers after we ordered ours ...
customer_reviews.text: My cousin bought one that looks just like this. I saw hers after we ordered ours and thought we had ordered the same thing. I was actually more impressed with this one than with hers. The material on the inside is more slick than the slide material. It doesn't make it more slippery but easier to clean if need be. We have kept this inside so far. It does shift a bit when a couple kids are jumping away but that's because we don't have it tied down. My son LOVES it! He is two right now and it will entertain him for years to come. We had it out for his birthday and the kids had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: wittlebit83

customer_reviews.title: A Blast in the Blast House Magic Castle!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids had a blast in this Magic Castle Bouncer on their summer vacation at our house! We inflated it in our garage (in under a minute) and was the first thing the 3 year olds asked for every morning - 'is the bouncy house awake?' And they loved to see it "wake up" every morning and "go to sleep" when they were finished bouncing. Folding it up to put back in the box was fairly easy too - next "wake up" will be a granddaughter's birthday party in the fall. What a lot of fun - a strong, sturdy and clean bounce house, so much better and less expensive than a rental!
customer_reviews.author: travelingnana

customer_reviews.title: Great item or small children indoors!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to be able to put inside or outside. This winter has been crazy bad with weather and this is a god send. The kids get their energy out as they go crazy inside. Set up us so simple. Tear down takes a little work.
customer_reviews.author: Farty McFry

customer_reviews.title: Happy Papa and Grand Daughter.
customer_reviews.text: This was a combination Birthday/Christmas present for Grand Daughter who turns 2 years old Dec. 3rd. Well we kept her for the weekend last week. And Papa couldn't wait. I thought she won't know what day she got it anyway. Set it up in the Living room and she loved it. Papa even climbed inside with her. We both took a long nap that afternoon. Watching the enjoyment on her face makes it worth every penny. Very high quality inflatable.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Atherton

customer_reviews.title: So fun! So perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was PERFECT! I purchased for my daughter's fourth birthday and it ended up raining so I brought it inside and it worked so well! We had kids from 2-8 jumping on it and it was such a hit! I would DEFINITELY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted to play in a bouncy house but was afraid of the other kids rough-housing in other bounce houses. I bought this bounce house because of the durability, size and to get him familiar with and to gain confidence. It is so easy to inflate (one minute), deflate (one minute) and he loves this product, as do his mom and dad! It's very durable and he can play and bounce without fear of being knocked over. His little friend came over and they had a blast. His cousin bounced with him and he was comfortable bouncing with her as well. Great product all around!
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Super buy, super fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! I decided for the price I should invest in buying the bounce house instead of renting one. It was a great decision. Sets up quickly and easily so the kids can enjoy it whenever we have a picnic or gathering. They all love it and never get tired of it. It disassembles just as quickly but doesn't fit as easily back in the carrying case so I store it in a large tubby. Worth every penny to be able to use wherever, whenever!
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Great way for kids to vent energy
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! We have been looking for a good way to burn out some of our children's energy and give them exercise throughout this cold, crappy inversion filled winter. Took it out of the box in our family room and had it hooked up and inflated before the dvd started. We let the kids jump and play in it for 15-60 minutes. Easy to deflate an roll up for the next day. The ONLY bad thing about this is how loud it is. We can live with the lack of room and noise if it helps to keep up all happy, healthy and sane. We have yet to have warm enough weather to use it outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: The Blast Zone Magic Castle moonbounce was PERFECT for my son's 2nd birthday party
customer_reviews.text: The Blast Zone Magic Castle moonbounce was PERFECT for my son's 2nd birthday party! The kids at his party were ages 2 to 4 and had a blast. The moonbounce sure made for easy party planning. We have now used it 3 times and each time my son and his best friend love it. Setup and cleanup are very simple. Even our babysitter is excited that it fits in our living room and she can use it indoors as well. We bought 200 plastic balls to put inside, and somehow it looked like only a tiny amount but the kids love having the extra balls.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good bouncy house for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bouncy house for the price! My grandkids have gotten hours and hours of fun in this. It's easy to put up and take down. It is big so you have to have room to store it, but it is a bouncy house! My grandsons have not been easy on it and it is holding up. I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so when we have a weekend where it is raining all the time and the kids are stuck inside, this thing is just the right size to blow up in our living room and let the kids go to town. It appears to be well built, as I made sure to test it on myself before putting the kids in. You can get a lot of bounce out of this thing. All things considered, it is not even that noisy.
customer_reviews.author: DWB

customer_reviews.title: Blast Zone stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for us. We’ve had it for 3 years, used it inside and out. Actually the blower just broke recently. This was well out of warranty, and the company replaced it for free!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Bassett

customer_reviews.title: FUN for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I too read all the reviews and extremely happy that the reviews were correct. This is so easy to use and the 9 year old birthday party was a hit! The bounce house was up by 12noon and the 6 children that attended never stopped. Durable and safe. I would recommend this product to any Grammy out there to allow the grandchildren have a blast. Ages were 3yrs to 10 yrs and there was not problem with the weight or the bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Holdeman

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this Bounce House!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bounce house for my daughter's second birthday and she loves it along with my son and their friends. It is well made and provides hours of fun for the kids. I love that it only takes a few minutes to inflate and deflate. I have spent hours researching bounce houses and even tried a friend's bounce house. This one is perfect for us. Although they recommend 3 children, we were able to get 5 small children 3 years old and under to bounce and have a lot of fun. I would highly recommend this bounce house.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!  You just can't go wrong with a bounce house.
customer_reviews.text: Set up is a breeze. One person can easily do it in just a few minutes. My kids are 9 & 12 and it accomidates them easily. We have had ours for 7 months and it has had quite a bit of use and it is still going strong. You will need a large plastic tote to store it in when not in use. Getting it back into the box would require an act of God. :) If you must use an extension cord remember to oversize. I would recommend nothing less than a 10 for safety (not the cheaper 14 or 12).
customer_reviews.author: Steve Leach

customer_reviews.title: Happy to say it was a hit at the party
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this bounce house for a birthday party this past Saturday. Before we actually put kids in we tested to make sure all parts as noted in the product description. No holes or rips in the material. To our surprise the blower was quiet. Happy to say it was a hit at the party. All of the kids were wore out.
customer_reviews.author: Kermlindusk

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 and 3 year old enjoy jumping in it. It is very heavy and requires a large tote to store it when not in use. When the children are jumping on it the air pushes back towards the pump and makes a air whooping sound with each bounce, that’s a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Stone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for young kids!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases! My 5 year old and her friends LOVE it! My 9 year old and her friends say they can’t bounce so I assume that’s when it stops for the fun. We keep it in our living room during winter and it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to a crowd!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bouncy castle! Our kids had one for years when they were young (4 kids, ages 2-7). It was a lifesaver then, in the yard as well as inside the house during some cold northeast winters. We regularly had 4-5 (sometimes 6-7) kids jumping happily in this thing and it lasted for years! We recently purchased it again for our nephew's 5th birthday. It was a hit at the party....stood up to a few not-so-little older cousins sneaking in, as well as the 4-7 year old set. Easy to set up, bright and inviting, and just fun. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Bang for you buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny! My 4yo and 2yo love it so much! Best value on amazon for sure! Plus it’s the only one I’ve seen that can support 300 lbs. yup blower is included.. why spend 50 - 100 for a rental and not own one. So if you have the space it’s worth it! Amazon recommends the balls I thought it would be fun too but kids done like it while the are bouncing..
customer_reviews.author: ATAM

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazingly durable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Had it for years and it’s taken serious abuse. Not one repair or moldy spot. I love this and it was the most durable kids outdoor toy I’ve ever bought! Totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: Blast Zone Magic Castle - Inflatable Bounce House with Blower - Premium Quality - Indoor/Outdoor - Portable - Sets Up in Seconds
product_meta.description: It comes as no surprise that the Blast Zone Magic Castle Bounce House is our all-time bestseller. Bigger and better than ever, this inflatable blows up in just seconds and accommodates three little princes and princesses at once. It features a safe slope slide, safety netting, and a Velcro entrance so that you can sit back and relax while the kids party. Eye-catching in bold shades of red, blue, and yellow, this bounce house is better described as a palace, complete with turrets and flags. It features a commercial-grade vinyl floor for extra durability and reinforced seams to ensure that every bounce is a satisfying one. Designed for use both outdoors and in, the Magic Castle is perfect for parties, sleepovers, and backyard fun. The extra-high walls and netting reach a full 60 inches from the bounce platform, but are low enough to clear standard ceilings. It's easy to set up, store, and transport. Features: Overall Dimensions: 8.5W x 11D x 8H feet Bounce Floor: 6.5W x 6.33D feet Maximum Occupancy: 3 Recommended Ages: 3 to 8 Inflate Time: 1 minute This incredible set comes complete with the inflatable unit, UL-approved blower, storage straps, and stakes for both the blower and bouncer. When not in use, the inflatable conveniently rolls up, requiring about as much space as a medium to large sleeping bag. To set up your bouncer, simply unroll it. Hook the inflation tube to the blower, turn the latter on, and stake the inflatable down. The blower is designed to run continuously while children play. Air escapes through the seams and fabric. This bouncer is suitable for residential use. Lead-free products: A note from Blast Zone Recent allegations by the state of California against producers and distributors of inflatable bounce products concerning illegal lead concentrations are of great concern to us and our customers. Blast Zone products are not included in these allegations.
feature_bullets: Features dimension: 8.5' W x 11' L x 8' H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars1,459 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
